abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Annual Progress Report (APR)
            of Georgia's Poverty Reduction Strategy was prepared by
            the Government of Georgia. It contains a review of the
            progress over the 2004/2005 period including an analysis of
            economic and social developments, consultation held, actions
            taken, and results achieved against agreed Poverty Reduction
            Strategy  indicators. The joint IDA-IMF Staff Advisory Note
            (JSAN) on the APR discusses the staffs' views on the
            Poverty Reduction Strategy  implementation to date, reports
            on progress addressing issues raised in the previous JSAN,
            and provides advice on key priorities for strengthening the
            PRSP process further.
